items.content_html: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. This app features a real-time 3D drone visualization, motor thrust plots, and a built-in code editor, allowing users to test flight logic directly in the browser. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.
items.title: Rakshan-VP/Quadcopter-sim: A lightweight web-based simulator for controlling a UAV using Python code. Ideal for testing drone dynamics, control systems, and autonomous flight.

items.content_html: JobTrack is a lightweight tool designed to help you keep track of your job applications. It allows you to log application dates, responses, follow-ups, and other relevant details—perfect for organizing job searches or fulfilling documentation requirements.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: DotWriter is a lightweight Chrome extension that brings AI-assisted writing directly to your browser. Simply type -- in any text field—emails, documents, chats—and DotWriter instantly offers intelligent suggestions to help you write faster and better. Designed for professionals, creators, and anyone who types on the web. Built with privacy and perf

items.content_html: A lightweight task management system built with Angular and .NET 9 Web API, featuring Firebase Authentication and a clean UI. Users can register, log in, and manage personal tasks with priority, due date, and status control.

items.content_html: A lightweight progressive web app for discovering curated Ethereum events around the world leading up to DevConnect in Buenos Aires. Built for explorers of the Ethereum ecosystem to visualize events on a global map, plan their journey, and connect with fellow travelers.

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
